Articles.Content:
just wanted to double check something:

If I wanted to create a thread where I could upload/link any KSP vids I make, where would the best place be to create such a thread?

[Live from Mission Control](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/53-Live-from-Mission-Control%21) is the intended place for vids. But sadly that is quite a dark corner of the forum and doesn't get as much traffic. Put your vids there, but I'd also suggest putting a picture that links to your youtube channel or direct to 1 or 2 vids in your signature (just make sure the pic conforms to sig size rules; 120px tall by err I've forgotten how wide, 720px wide I think). you'll get more hits of that.
just general/interesting/funny gameplay i happen to record and think others might enjoy, basicly.
Yes, [Live from Mission Control is the correct subforum](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/53-Live-from-Mission-Control%21).
